S

scale - Variable in class main.GamePanel
variable used to set the screen size
score - Variable in class entities.HUD
 
score - Variable in class entities.Tomb
the score to print on screen
scoreShowing - Variable in class entities.Tomb
 
select - Variable in class main.KeyHandler
 
selectorLimiter - Variable in class entities.Bomb
index limiter to not exceed the array
selectorLimiter - Variable in class entities.Senshiyan
index limiter to not exceed the array
Senshiyan - Class in entities
the green tank enemies, their update, draw and animation
Senshiyan(GamePanel, HUD, int, int, int) - Constructor for class entities.Senshiyan
inherits the superconstructor, creates the flames and the future tomb, loads all the sprites
setFile(int) - Method in class main.Sound
opens the sound file in order to play it and loads it into an array "clipList" (used for sound effects)
setLevel() - Method in class entities.HUD
called by the gameOver's method update, is used to reset lives when dead
setLevel(int) - Method in class backgrounds.GameOver
called by player's method update when death, is used to assign the current level to the gameOver, it will be utilized to restart the level when player dies
setLevel(int) - Method in class entities.Bomb
called by the constructor, depending on the level in which the object is generated adds the object to an entity list used to call the updates
setLevel(int) - Method in class entities.Player
called by the gamePanel's method setLevel, adds the player to the current level's entities array
setLevel(int) - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by the title update, the gameOver update, the psswrd update and the player update, initialize the arrays that contains the entities and their colliders, instantiate the object stage and calls the level creator
setMusicFile(int) - Method in class main.Sound
opens the sound file in order to play it and loads into the variable "clip" (used for music)
setOgPosition() - Method in class entities.Player
called by the method update, resets the player to his original coordinates and stats (removes the powerUps)
setPosition(int, int) - Method in class entities.Entity
called in other entities method when needed to active another entity, sets the position of the entity that calls the method and sets it on active
setType(String) - Method in class entities.Collider
used to change the type of the collider (for example between bomb and exploded bomb)
setValues(int, int, int, int) - Method in class entities.Collider
used to set collider position and size
shadow - Variable in class entities.SoftWall
changes the kind of sprite loaded for this softWall
SoftWall - Class in entities
the destructible walls, their update, draw and animation
SoftWall(int, int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, String, GamePanel, PowerUp) - Constructor for class entities.SoftWall
inherits the superconstructor, loads the sprites and sets values
sound - Variable in class main.GamePanel
used to manage the start and stop of music and sound effect
Sound - Class in main
contains the sound library and the methods to play and stop both SE and music
Sound() - Constructor for class main.Sound
loads all the sound files into an array
soundURL - Variable in class main.Sound
holds the sound's files

stage - Variable in class main.GamePanel
 
Stage - Class in backgrounds
the backgrounds for each stage, their building methods and draw
Stage(GamePanel, int) - Constructor for class backgrounds.Stage
assigns the values, loads the sprites and creates the collider for the border of the map and the unbreakable walls on the map
stage1 - Variable in class main.GamePanel
 
stage2 - Variable in class main.GamePanel
 
start() - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by the main, instantiate the thread
stop() - Method in class main.Sound
stops the sound loaded in clip
stopMusic() - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by setLevel, calls the method stop of the object "sound", in order to stop music
subFolder - Variable in class entities.Entity
directory for the files
surroundedStateManager() - Method in class entities.Entity
called by the method update of enemies manages their surroundings, it's utilized to reset the state of the surroundings near the entity calling the method
surroundingsManager(Collider, Collider) - Method in class entities.Entity
called by the collisionManager, calls the enemy's collider's method checkSurroundings to review the surroundings and manages the values of the entity about the circumnstances
